mapper.select: insert into cart (cart_id, userid, product_id, amount) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{userid}, #{product_id}, #{amount})
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where cart_id=#{cart_id}
mapper.select: select p.product_id, product_name, price, sum(amount) amount, sum(price * amount) money from tbl_member m, cart c, product p where m.userid=c.userid and c.product_id=p.product_id and c.userid=#{userid} group by p.product_id, product_name, price order by product_name
